testcase.name: Verify Login For valid inputs and messase as Login Successful
testcase.system-out: Given user navigates to login page..........................................passed When user enters correct user name and password.............................passed Then user is directed to the home page......................................passed When user is on Home page diplay a message as Login Successful..............passed Then Logout.................................................................passed

testcase.name: Verify Login For invalid inputs and messase as Login Successful
testcase.system-out: Given user navigates to login page..........................................passed When user enters incorrect user name or incorrect password..................passed Then user error message is displayed........................................passed
